attributes.action: Free 15hrs childcare for all 2 year olds.
attributes.additional_details:
I am a working parent to my two year old son. Me and my husband struggle to afford childcare for my son, I have cut down my hours at work to look after my son and my parents also help me. My son goes to a childminder 2 days a week as that is all we can afford.

I have several friends with children who have cut down hours at work as childcare is so expensive.

I believe 15hrs free childcare should be available to all parents of 2 years olds no matter what your circumstances are.

Free childcare would enable all children to benefit and help many families benefit financially.
